mapper.select: SELECT provider_code AS providerCode, provider_user_id AS providerUserId, nickname, email, user_role AS role, phone, user_status AS status, created_at AS joinDate FROM users

SELECT provider_code AS providerCode, provider_user_id AS providerUserId, nickname, email, user_role AS role, phone, user_status AS status, created_at AS joinDate FROM users WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT u.provider_code AS providerCode, u.provider_user_id AS providerUserId, u.nickname, u.email, u.phone, u.user_status AS status, DATE_FORMAT(u.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS joinDate, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations r WHERE r.provider_code = u.provider_code AND r.provider_user_id = u.provider_user_id ) AS reservationCount FROM users u WHERE u.provider_code = #{providerCode} AND u.provider_user_id = #{providerUserId}

SELECT provider_code AS providerCode, provider_user_id AS providerUserId, nickname, email, user_role AS role, phone, user_status AS status, created_at AS joinDate FROM users WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY)
